title.narrative: 1.2. STATE-FUNDED SOCIAL SERVICES

description.narrative: Development of curricula for a standard social work training module (including child protection) for para-professional social workers, which contributes to Child Protection Systems, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Social Protection, Supply And Logistics. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Children, especially the most deprived, access and utilize quality and equitable protection, education, health and nutrition services

sector.narrative: Services to prevent or respond to violence, exploitation and abuse
Social services (incl youth development and women+ children)
Social welfare workforce strengthening - Case management, referral, capacity development
Social welfare workforce systems strengthening (accreditation, staffing and supervision)

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Development of curricula for a standard social work training module (including child protection) for para-professional socialworkers

description.narrative: The Minimum Package of Social Services was updated and finalized with UNICEF’s support and will be a guiding framework for the development of the social services system in the country. An online Social Work Training Programme was developed for the first time to support comprehensive capacity building of social work practitioners. UNICEF’s global resources and guidelines on MHPSS and Child Protection in Emergencies were introduced and applied during the escalation of the conflict in and beyond the Nagorno-Karabakh region. | Status:Met | As-of Date:18/01/2021

title.narrative: of social and legal services exists for deprived children with approved annual budget and quality standards (Minimum Package of Social Services for Children)(42469)
2.12 Social welfare workforce strengthened and connected to social protection system (case management, referral capacity development)

actual.value: 2020:Electronic Case Management software will be taken over by the Social Services Agency of the MoLSPP. Online Social work training program developed and will be used by Social Services Agency of the MoLSPP for capacity building of social work practitioners.

title.narrative: Quality assurance system in place for social service work in the pilot districts(57406)

actual.value: 2020:Quality standards and SOP's for social work and social services are implemented in pilot districts.
